document_data.caption: Cabachon-cut nacre.
document_data.name: Nacre
document_data.mainbody: '''Nacre''' was a precious substance that made up [[pearl]] and [[mother of pearl]], as well as some [[shell]]s.{{Cite dragon/72/Gems Galore|22}}
document_data.Description: As a precious material, nacre was distinguished from mother of pearl by its "fire luster". Like other shells, [[ivory]], and precious metals, nacre was used for decorative inlays on artistic objects.{{Cite dragon/82/Spells between the covers|67}}
document_data.Occurrence:
* [[Giant clam]]s were lined with mother of pearl and nacre, as their [[clam|smaller cousins]] were.{{Cite dragon/116/The Dragon's Bestiary|39}}
* [[Turbo]] and [[trochus]] shells contained mother of pearl and nacre.
